Summary: Saw a large blue, white silver object, with another on above it white.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around November 21st 2008
divs: Sighting Detailswe went out to eat it was so cold. when we came out of the car I noticed over the interstate 85, a blue ,white light it was low and sitting still, it was so cold . we went down chamblee tucker rd. and I noticed two lights one higher up was white, the one treetop level was blue, white and glowed. when we got home I looked over too the trees and they were now lower than before. I wanted to watch but it was to cold. I looked again and they were gone. My Son also saw them, as he was driving.I felt like I was being followed. But it didn't really bother me.
